Title: Keratin hair therapy with infrared press, haircut and styling with press or shallow
Description: The main ingredient for this rejuvenating treatment is keratin. Unlike other therapies that therapy is available in major markets. The therapy aims to revitalize her hair as deliver much needed strength, brilliance, resilience and keratin and it dalbochina.Traditsionnite therapy in combination with heat treatment alter the structure of the hair. Restoration therapy only strengthen existing structure of the hair and facilitate its styling. Human hair is nourished, brittle hair becomes healthier and easier to straighten and curl are highlighted. After implementing the special revitalizing hair therapy is much livelier, easier to comb, a shiny, silky soft. Moreover therapy protects hair from humidity from the weather, fog. Restoration therapy has long action, itself therapy can be done frequently if the customer wishes. Products, shampoo, conditioner and mask are free of sulfates that prolong the effects of the applied therapy. Ideal for all types of hair.

Title: Mask, hair dryers and clippers or painting, washer and dryer - with or without a haircut from Hair Stylist Kapanov
Description: Trim, wash, nourishing mask and styling with hair dryer and styling products. Painting from the lounge, washing with high-quality shampoo, applying a mask and styling with hair dryer and styling products.

Title: Keratin hair therapy or painting and mask - with or without trimming
Description: Протеинът кератин се съдържа в косата, а кератиновата терапия има за цел да възстанови нивата на този протеин в накъсаната или увредена коса. Поставянето на кератин запълва увредените участъци и ги прави гладки, което намалява накъсването на косата и я заздравява за известен период. Чудесен метод за предпазване на косата от палещите слънчеви лъчи.
